widgets.name: MediaLabeledSlider
widgets.description: A horizontal slider component displaying media items with labels underneath

widgetData.description: Data specific to the MediaLabeledSlider widget

items.description: Array of media items with labels to display in the slider

label.description: Text label to display below the media item (supports HTML)

sliderConfig.description: Configuration options for the slider behavior

slidesToShow.description: Number of slides to show at once on mobile

slidesToShowDesktop.description: Number of slides to show at once on desktop

aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio for the media items in the slider

showPeek.description: Whether to show a peek of the next/previous slide

peekVariant.description: Size of the peek when showPeek is enabled
